results.overview: Fred P. Chaney receives as inheritance after the death of his mother a speaking horse that also has good knowledge about the stock-market. With the help of this horse Fred gains a lot at the stock-market of Chicago.
results.title: Hot to Trot

results.overview: Inside the fascinating but little-known world of same-sex competitive ballroom dance, Hot to Trot follows a small international cast of four men and women, on and off the dance floor, over a four-year period.
results.title: Hot to Trot

results.overview: A cartoon adventure featuring Captain Goodvibes, the pig of steel, and his sidekick Astro.
results.title: Hot to Trot

results.overview: Dr. George Dumurrier is looking for money to expand the San Francisco based clinic he runs with his brother.  He is also having an affair with Jane, a glamorous fashion photographer.  When Dumurrier's wife Susan dies following an asthma attack, leaving him a million dollar insurance pay-out, it seems that all his problems are solved - until an anonymous phone call sends him to the Roaring 20s strip club where he is astonished to discover that its featured performer, the dangerously desirable Monica Weston, looks exactly like his dead wife.  As he tries to unravel this mystery, George learns that the police are now investigating his wife's death and that he is under suspicion of murder.
results.title: One on Top of the Other
